name: VR Box (Brush Wizard)
description:
Welcome to VR BOX!

VR BOX will be a growing pack of games to play along with your friends or by yourself!

This Packaged Includes:

  • Brush Wizard

This Package Will Eventaully Have: (Not Limited To)

  • Robo Slayer(Stand Still Shooter)
  • Archer Exetreme(Stand Still Shooter)

--- Brush Wizard ---

Brush Wizard will be a MMORPG that will have lots to do! (Over Time Of Course)

Although the plans for the game are still "In The Works", the game has some very basic features which would include the following:

  • Single Player Gameplay 
  • Oculus Head & Touch Support
  • HP, MP, Exp Bars that are influenced by EnemyAI
  • Teleporting Movement + RightJoystick Rotation
  • More Not Listed Founded InGame
  • Quests

The Games Goals:

  • Online Multiplayer VR Experience
  • RPG Classes and Skill Tree
  • Capture Pet (Its similar to Pokemon but in VR)
  • And more to yet be released

*Please note with game is under development still and will take some time

**The Developer is currently working on this project as a hobby as of right now
